theme.name: Default
theme.template:
• {$totalServers} {lang="aXenServerList_widget_totalServers"}
  • {$totalPlayers} / {$totalPlayersMax} {lang="aXenServerList_widget_totalPlayers"}
  • {{$totalPlayersPercent = $totalPlayersMax ? round( ($totalPlayers * 100) / $totalPlayersMax ) : 0;}} {$totalPlayersPercent}% {lang="aXenServerList_widget_totalPlayersPercent"}

{{if $row['axenserverlist_owners']}}
  • {lang='aXenServerList_widget_owners'}
      {{foreach array_filter(explode(',', $row['axenserverlist_owners'])) as $owner}}
    • {{$member = \IPS\Member::load( $owner );}} {$member->link()|raw}
      • {{endforeach}}
    • {{endif}}
  • {lang='aXenServerList_widget_map'} {{if $row['axenserverlist_map']}}{$row['axenserverlist_map']} {{else}}{lang='aXenServerList_widget_none'}{{endif}}
  • {lang='aXenServerList_widget_protocol'} {{if $row['axenserverlist_protocol']}}{$row['axenserverlist_protocol']} {{else}}{lang='aXenServerList_widget_none'}{{endif}}
  • {lang='aXenServerList_widget_password'} {{if $row['axenserverlist_password']}}{lang='yes'} {{else}}{lang='no'}{{endif}}
  • {lang='aXenServerList_widget_percent_players'} {$row['axenserverlist_max_players'] ? round( ($row['axenserverlist_current_players'] * 100) / $row['axenserverlist_max_players'] ) : 0}%
  • {lang='aXenServerList_widget_most_players'} {$row['axenserverlist_most_players']}
{{if $row['axenserverlist_forum'] || $row['axenserverlist_vote'] || $row['axenserverlist_statistics'] || $row['axenserverlist_tv']}}

• {{$icons = $row["axenserverlist_game"] . '.png';}} {{if settings.lazy_load_enabled}} {{else}} {{endif}} {{if $row['axenserverlist_top_server']}} {{$topServerLang = 'axenserverlist_top_server_text_' . $row['axenserverlist_id'];}} {{endif}} {{if $row['axenserverlist_new']}} {lang="aXenServerList_widget_new"} {{endif}} {$row['axenserverlist_name_default'] ? $row['axenserverlist_name_default_text'] : $row['axenserverlist_name']}
    • {{if $row['axenserverlist_connect_link']}} {{endif}} {{if $row['axenserverlist_game'] == 'discord' && !$row['axenserverlist_ip_custom']}} {lang="aXenServerList_widget_clickToConnect"} {{else}}{$row['axenserverlist_ip_custom'] ? $row['axenserverlist_ip_custom'] : $row['axenserverlist_ip']}{{endif}}
    • {{$calcPlayers = $row['axenserverlist_max_players'] ? round( ($row['axenserverlist_current_players'] * 100) / $row['axenserverlist_max_players'] ) : 0;}} {$row['axenserverlist_current_players']} / {$row['axenserverlist_max_players']}
      • {{if $row['axenserverlist_owners']}}
      • {{foreach array_filter(explode(',', $row['axenserverlist_owners'])) as $owner}}
      • {{$member = \IPS\Member::load( $owner );}} {$member->link()|raw}
        • {{endforeach}}
      • {{endif}}

{lang="aXenServerList_widget_title"} {{if settings.aXenServerList_settings_scroll && settings.aXenServerList_settings_scroll_control}} {{endif}} {{if settings.aXenServerList_settings_fullWidth && settings.aXenServerList_settings_fullWidth_control && $orientation != 'vertical'}} {{endif}}

{{if settings.aXenServerList_settings_footer}} {{$totalServers = 0;}} {{$totalPlayers = 0;}} {{$totalPlayersMax = 0;}} {{endif}}
    {{foreach $servers as $row}} {{if settings.aXenServerList_settings_footer}} {{$totalServers += 1;}} {{$totalPlayers += $row['axenserverlist_current_players'];}} {{$totalPlayersMax += $row['axenserverlist_max_players'];}} {{endif}} {template="row" app="axenserverlist" group="servers" location="front" params="$row"} {{endforeach}}
{template="footer" app="axenserverlist" group="servers" location="front" if="settings.aXenServerList_settings_footer" params="$totalServers, $totalPlayers, $totalPlayersMax"}
